title: Message sort setting is randomly forgotten
content: I always set all my accounts to View > Sort by > Order Received (Ascending, Threaded). Periodically, I find that the "Sort by" setting has been forgotten, and I have to go back and return it to "Order Received". Is this a known issue? I haven't found any correlation between the incidence of this behavior and any actions I have taken -- except that when it does happen, I discover it upon changing accounts or upon opening Thunderbird. It doesn't seem to occur while I'm reading email within an account.
